title: Global Logistics Manager - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Global Logistics Manager Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for leading the development, implementation and successful transition of strategic projects in the area of logistics service strategies, strategic sourcing, supplier relationship...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
